title: Two Sides Of The Same Coin
features: "Two Sides Of The Same Coin" may sound cliche, but it is far from being typical. This a tale of two individuals by the names of Malik and Nicole. The book is divided into male and female parts to archive their experiences involving love and relationships. The book is a series of poems that tell their stories throughout their relationships involving first acquaintances, the "getting to know you" phase, and many more from both the male and female perspectives. Through the book, the reader will be taken on a journey throughout the relationship of a man and a woman through their eyes, but everything isn't perfect in paradise. These two stories describe how every connection developed with a person will either add or take something away from your life. Love can be beautiful, but don't be naive to it's deceitful ways.
description: Sheldon Gilton, is a young individual currently studying Finance at the University of Louisiana at Lafayette. He is passionate about writing. To him, the pen an paper is an escape from life and daily matters. He believe in the paper, anyone is able to whatever they choose to be. There are no limits. Writing is the perfect to convey hidden emotions that wouldn't sound right if spoken. He prides himself on his work in hopes that he can touch others through the use of his words. He feels if he touches one person, then that's worth a hundred plus.
